kw.name: Verifier si l'utilisateur n'existe pas dans la bd
Connect To Database Using Custom Params
kw.doc: Loads the DB API 2.0 module given `dbapiModuleName` then uses it to connect to the database using the map string `db_custom_param_string`.
kw.msg: Executing : Connect To Database Using Custom Params : pymysql.connect(db_api_2.connect(database='demo', user='root', password='', host = 'localhost'))

kw.name: Row Count Is 0
kw.arg: select id from users where username = '${USERNAME}' and password = md5('${PASSWORD}')
kw.doc: Check if any rows are returned from the submitted `selectStatement`. If there are, then this will throw an AssertionError. Set optional input `sansTran` to True to run command without an explicit transaction commit or rollback.
kw.msg: Executing : Row Count Is 0 | select id from users where username = 'john' and password = md5('doe')
